game.title: Bendy and the Ink Machine
game.description: Bendy and the Ink Machine is a first-person puzzle-action horror game that begins in the far days past of animation and ends in a very dark future. Play as Henry as he revisits the haunted animation studio of his past, uncovering the mysteries behind the ink machine and the terrifying cartoon creatures that now roam the halls.

specifications.languages: PORTUGUÊS, 日本語, 中文, РУССКИЙ, ENGLISH, FRANÇAIS, ITALIANO, DEUTSCH, ESPAÑOL
